name: part_004
file: tmp_【3D Debut】Watch the way I move~ #3DemonDebut #holoadvent [2Nob6f5dy7c]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Nerissa Ravencroft, Takane Lui, and Takanashi Kiara make a chaotic 'soup' in a large cauldron, adding various items donated by other Hololive members.
Transition title card for the segment.
The three Hololive members taste the completed purple 'soup' and react to its questionable quality.

subtitles.original: Yes, I guess I'll get started.
subtitles.english: Yes, I guess I'll get started.

subtitles.original: Oh, okay. Right into it.
subtitles.english: Oh, okay. Right into it.

subtitles.original: So, uh, we're going to be making it in this big cauldron.
subtitles.english: So, uh, we're going to be making it in this big cauldron.

subtitles.original: Ooh! Magical, mystical.
subtitles.english: Ooh! Magical, mystical.

subtitles.original: And we're starting out with some chicken salt donated by Bae-senpai.
subtitles.english: And we're starting out with some chicken salt donated by Bae-senpai.

subtitles.original: She gave me that before as a present!
subtitles.english: She gave me that before as a present!

subtitles.original: Oh! Oh hey! Hey!
subtitles.english: Oh! Oh hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: I'm so sorry! You can't do that!
subtitles.english: I'm so sorry! You can't do that!

subtitles.original: Oh my God, Bijou, take it out!
subtitles.english: Oh my God, Bijou, take it out!

subtitles.original: No, I, you know, I think it's fine. I think it's fine that way.
subtitles.english: No, I, you know, I think it's fine. I think it's fine that way.

subtitles.original: Oh... Why? Oh, what's next?
subtitles.english: Oh... Why? Oh, what's next?

subtitles.original: Uh, this is donated by Shiori. It's an eggplant...
subtitles.english: Uh, this is donated by Shiori. It's an eggplant...

subtitles.original: ...and it looks like Yorick, her little mascot guy.
subtitles.english: ...and it looks like Yorick, her little mascot guy.

subtitles.original: It's so... it's so cute, isn't he?
subtitles.english: It's so... it's so cute, isn't he?

subtitles.original: So yeah, just plop! Right in there.
subtitles.english: So yeah, just plop! Right in there.

subtitles.original: Oh! Oh, not cutting?
subtitles.english: Oh! Oh, not cutting?

subtitles.original: Oh yeah, you know, if we cook it long enough it'll like disintegrate, right?
subtitles.english: Oh yeah, you know, if we cook it long enough it'll like disintegrate, right?

subtitles.original: Alright, alright. So yeah, it doesn't really make sense to cut it up...
subtitles.english: Alright, alright. So yeah, it doesn't really make sense to cut it up...

subtitles.original: ...because it's going to cut itself up.
subtitles.english: ...because it's going to cut itself up.

subtitles.original: Okay, like what do you have the kitchen for, right? Under a knife, we don't need that. No cutting.
subtitles.english: Okay, like what do you have the kitchen for, right? Under a knife, we don't need that. No cutting.

subtitles.original: And this one, can you predict who it could be from?
subtitles.english: And this one, can you predict who it could be from?

subtitles.original: It says... Bijou's feet salt? Feet salt! Feet flakes!
subtitles.english: It says... Bijou's feet salt? Feet salt! Feet flakes!

subtitles.original: Yeah! No!
subtitles.english: Yeah! No!

subtitles.original: So just... oh my god! Oh my god!
subtitles.english: So just... oh my god! Oh my god!

subtitles.original: I can like smell the salt.
subtitles.english: I can like smell the salt.

subtitles.original: Really? It's okay.
subtitles.english: Really? It's okay.

subtitles.original: Now we have this... this is from Mumei-senpai.
subtitles.english: Now we have this... this is from Mumei-senpai.

subtitles.original: Don't drop the whole thing! Try to be more careful! Maybe this time...
subtitles.english: Don't drop the whole thing! Try to be more careful! Maybe this time...

subtitles.original: Okay, ah! Here! Careful, careful, careful!
subtitles.english: Okay, ah! Here! Careful, careful, careful!

subtitles.original: Oh my God! It's okay! 大丈夫！大丈夫！
subtitles.english: Oh my God! It's okay! It's okay! It's okay!

subtitles.original: Horrible! Why 大丈夫？ Why 大丈夫？ Why did you start?
subtitles.english: Horrible! Why okay? Why okay? Why did you start?

subtitles.original: No, not 大丈夫. We still have the sapling!
subtitles.english: No, not okay. We still have the sapling!

subtitles.original: Still have a sapling, which I'm sure this will absorb all the salt, right?
subtitles.english: Still have a sapling, which I'm sure this will absorb all the salt, right?

subtitles.original: Our veggies, yes! So good.
subtitles.english: Our veggies, yes! So good.

subtitles.original: But first, I want to cut off this...
subtitles.english: But first, I want to cut off this...

subtitles.original: Oh! No! It's sad!
subtitles.english: Oh! No! It's sad!

subtitles.original: Sorry about your haircut.
subtitles.english: Sorry about your haircut.

subtitles.original: Ah, hey! Yeah, well, I guess that's fine. Could have cut it a bit more, it's small.
subtitles.english: Ah, hey! Yeah, well, I guess that's fine. Could have cut it a bit more, it's small.

subtitles.original: And then we just have a little bit of garnish to put on top.
subtitles.english: And then we just have a little bit of garnish to put on top.

subtitles.original: How about we eat separately? No, no, no, they're donuts!
subtitles.english: How about we eat separately? No, no, no, they're donuts!

subtitles.original: Donated by Fuwawa and Mococo respectively.
subtitles.english: Donated by Fuwawa and Mococo respectively.

subtitles.original: They each gave me one, so let's go ahead and put them in!
subtitles.english: They each gave me one, so let's go ahead and put them in!

subtitles.original: Oh no! No! Oh no!
subtitles.english: Oh no! No! Oh no!

subtitles.original: However, it doesn't stop there. Now we have to stir the soup.
subtitles.english: However, it doesn't stop there. Now we have to stir the soup.

subtitles.original: So we have to give it a really good stir with all those ingredients.
subtitles.english: So we have to give it a really good stir with all those ingredients.

subtitles.original: Oh no, no, no, no, no.
subtitles.english: Oh no, no, no, no, no.

subtitles.original: Oh yeah, I think it's... look, it's coming together!
subtitles.english: Oh yeah, I think it's... look, it's coming together!

subtitles.original: You see the colors? Green!
subtitles.english: You see the colors? Green!

subtitles.original: Yes, the color... it's fine, it's fine. Look, it's not even there yet.
subtitles.english: Yes, the color... it's fine, it's fine. Look, it's not even there yet.

subtitles.original: No, that looks like melon soda or something.
subtitles.english: No, that looks like melon soda or something.

subtitles.original: Just a little more, huh? Perfect! Much better! Much better!
subtitles.english: Just a little more, huh? Perfect! Much better! Much better!

subtitles.original: Yeah, not perfect. 紫スープ。
subtitles.english: Yeah, not perfect. Purple soup.

subtitles.original: Oh, 紫スープ。 はい。
subtitles.english: Oh, purple soup. Yes.

subtitles.original: Oh my God. It's perfect. It looks like something from Hololive, right?
subtitles.english: Oh my God. It's perfect. It looks like something from Hololive, right?

subtitles.original: And no. Don't you think? I'm sure it's delicious.
subtitles.english: And no. Don't you think? I'm sure it's delicious.

subtitles.original: I don't want to eat. Yeah, you don't want to eat... Really good 肉じゃが。
subtitles.english: I don't want to eat. Yeah, you don't want to eat... Really good meat and potato stew.

subtitles.original: Is there more 肉じゃが？ More 肉じゃが？ Can we just finish?
subtitles.english: Is there more meat and potato stew? More? Can we just finish?

subtitles.original: So let's try! Let's eat! Let's eat! Let's eat!
subtitles.english: So let's try! Let's eat! Let's eat! Let's eat!

subtitles.original: No, oh my god, oh my god. No, no, no, I don't need... let's eat!
subtitles.english: No, oh my god, oh my god. No, no, no, I don't need... let's eat!

subtitles.original: It's fine, you guys have to taste it! No, oh my god!
subtitles.english: It's fine, you guys have to taste it! No, oh my god!

subtitles.original: You don't have to try, get back here! It's... this is... I'm your oshi so you have to!
subtitles.english: You don't have to try, get back here! It's... this is... I'm your oshi so you have to!

subtitles.original: 3D debut anniversary, okay. Okay, okay, happy 3D debut. All right, let's go!
subtitles.english: 3D debut anniversary, okay. Okay, okay, happy 3D debut. All right, let's go!

subtitles.original: Delicious Demonic Dishes with NERISSA RAVENCROFT
subtitles.english: Delicious Demonic Dishes with NERISSA RAVENCROFT

subtitles.original: And we're finally ready. Here is the final dish, as we've served it up.
subtitles.english: And we're finally ready. Here is the final dish, as we've served it up.

subtitles.original: Uh, don't you think it looks delicious?
subtitles.english: Uh, don't you think it looks delicious?

subtitles.original: I don't even want to look.
subtitles.english: I don't even want to look.

subtitles.original: Why? It looks good! Come on! It's purple, it's got donuts in it...
subtitles.english: Why? It looks good! Come on! It's purple, it's got donuts in it...

subtitles.original: ...it's going to be delicious.
subtitles.english: ...it's going to be delicious.

subtitles.original: Looks like grape juice... it shouldn't look like that. Oh, no.
subtitles.english: Looks like grape juice... it shouldn't look like that. Oh, no.

subtitles.original: No, it's okay, let's try it! Without further ado, abomination!
subtitles.english: No, it's okay, let's try it! Without further ado, abomination!

subtitles.original: How's it smell? How's the, uh, good point?
subtitles.english: How's it smell? How's the, uh, good point?

subtitles.original: Eh? Smell is okay.
subtitles.english: Eh? Smell is okay.

subtitles.original: Oh! Smell is okay! See? See? See? Smell is okay!
subtitles.english: Oh! Smell is okay! See? See? See? Smell is okay!

subtitles.original: Come on, don't knock it before you try it.
subtitles.english: Come on, don't knock it before you try it.

subtitles.original: It's like burning my nostrils. It'll be okay.
subtitles.english: It's like burning my nostrils. It'll be okay.

subtitles.original: いただきます！ Same timing.
subtitles.english: Let's eat! Same timing.

subtitles.original: No! What did you do to us? Oh my god! I didn't do anything!
subtitles.english: No! What did you do to us? Oh my god! I didn't do anything!

subtitles.original: She poisoned us! Oh my god! Maybe she wants to take control of Holotori!
subtitles.english: She poisoned us! Oh my god! Maybe she wants to take control of Holotori!

subtitles.original: No! No, no, no! I... it's not... it's really not that bad!
subtitles.english: No! No, no, no! I... it's not... it's really not that bad!

subtitles.original: Ugh, what have you... call you alive? It's not that bad, it's fine!
subtitles.english: Ugh, what have you... call you alive? It's not that bad, it's fine!

subtitles.original: Give... you're delicious! Yeah, I'll try again, see? Maybe hers tastes different.
subtitles.english: Give... you're delicious! Yeah, I'll try again, see? Maybe hers tastes different.

subtitles.original: Oh my god. Is it the same? Yeah, same.
subtitles.english: Oh my god. Is it the same? Yeah, same.

subtitles.original: Yeah, same, same, same. Cannot. No, sorry, Nerissa.
subtitles.english: Yeah, same, same, same. Cannot. No, sorry, Nerissa.

subtitles.original: It's hearty and it's filling! Enough, enough. Thank you.
subtitles.english: It's hearty and it's filling! Enough, enough. Thank you.

subtitles.original: This is not how you can treat your senpais. No!
subtitles.english: This is not how you can treat your senpais. No!

subtitles.original: Congratulations 3D debut, congratulations! Stop! Bye-bye!
subtitles.english: Congratulations 3D debut, congratulations! Stop! Bye-bye!
